title: Person of Interest 5x02 Sneak Peek "SNAFU" (HD)
author: televisionpromosdb
comment: holy shit, amy nailed every single one of them.
Amy was so on point at 1:37 with the little half turn.
Finch as Root is the best, that hair flip kills me every time :D

R00t's impression of harold is hilarious. 
actually this episode is going to be fun as hell as it looks like .
description:
Person of Interest 5x02 "SNAFU" - The Machine experiences a glitch during rebooting, supplying Reese and Fusco with the numbers of dozens of people not actually involved in crimes, while also locking Finch and Root out after identifying them as threats based on past violent behavior, on PERSON OF INTEREST, Monday, May 9th on CBS. Subscribe to tvpromosdb on Youtube for more Person of Interest season 5 promos in HD!
